parameters: Nagas?  An easy opponent for an experienced mage like me.
Phew, these nagas are tougher than they look.  But I can
*Huff huff* OK, that one was tough.  I better avoid another
fight since I'm getting pretty tired.
Ugh, I let my guard down!  Get off of me!
A naga bite.  Oh no, does that mean...
No! I can feel it creeping up my body!
My chest and my clothes!  No!  Have to stop it!
I have to share this delicious feeling with my comrades...
